Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and represent two different habitats, one on land and one in water, in their drawing.
The student can include a variety of living things in each habitat, such as trees, grasses, and animals like lizards or fish.
The student can correctly show how different types of plants and animals live in each habitat.
The student can use their drawing to show patterns or differences in the plant and animal diversity between the two habitats.
